attributes.action: implement a Road Pricing Scheme with the utmost urgency for national benefit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not only for the fear of global warming, but the obvious and ever-present local pollution (air and noise) that the need for a car-reduction strategy is urgent.  Our countryside and cities are blighted with ever-wider roads and higher multi-storey car parks, whilst communities are fragmented and eroded due to the ominous presence of the impersonal motor vehicle.  Do you really NEED to use a car?  The inconvenience of cycling is not an inconvenience at all - get mobile, get a bike! (I have.)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
